home.title: Pyro Timer Dashboard
home.subtitle: All your Star Citizen timers at a glance

about.title: About This Tool
about.description: Pyro Timer is a comprehensive fan-made tool for Star Citizen's contested zone operations in the Pyro system. Track executive hangar cycles, keycard printer cooldowns, and compboard collection all in one place.

featuresList.precision: High-precision executive hangar timer (±1 second accuracy)
featuresList.czTimers: All contested zone objective timers (Checkmate, Orbituary, Ruin Station)
featuresList.compboards: Compboard collection tracker with progress visualization
featuresList.localStorage: Local storage - your data never leaves your device

about.howItWorksText: All timers run in your browser using React and JavaScript. The executive hangar timer calculates the current cycle phase based on the known 185-minute cycle. Contested zone timers and your checklist are saved in your browser's local storage, so they persist even if you close the page.

creditsList.game: Game: Star Citizen by Cloud Imperium Games

about.disclaimer: Disclaimer: This is an unofficial fan-made tool, not affiliated with or endorsed by Cloud Imperium Games. Timer accuracy depends on your system clock being properly synced. Use at your own risk.

execHangar.title: Executive Hangar Status
execHangar.subtitle: PYAM-EXHANG Global Cycle • Synchronized Across All Servers
execHangar.syncWhenSee: Sync when you see the hangar change in-game

syncPanel.title: Sync to In-Game Phase
syncPanel.description: When you see the hangar change phases in Star Citizen, click the button below to sync the timer to the current game state.
syncPanel.tip: Tip: For best accuracy, sync the moment you see the phase change. The timer will remember your sync across browser sessions.

contestedZones.title: Contested Zone Timers
contestedZones.subtitle: Track keycard printers & objectives
contestedZones.noTimers: No active timers. Click 'Add Timer' to start tracking.
contestedZones.cooldownInfo: All Keycard Printers (30min) • Start timers when you or your team activates a printer to track when they'll be ready again.

compboards.title: Compboard Collection
compboards.subtitle: Track your progress collecting compboards across Pyro
compboards.collectAll: Collect all 7 unique compboards to unlock the Executive Hangar
compboards.startTimersHint: Start timers after collecting boards to track respawn times
compboards.confirmReset: Are you sure you want to reset all progress?

timers.printerWarning: Printer will be ready in under 3 minutes!

vault.title: Ruin Station Vault Door
vault.description: Opens for 1 min, closed for 20 min (repeating cycle)
vault.syncInstruction: Click "Door Opened Now" when you see the vault door open to start tracking.

led.label: LED {{number}}
led.description: Lights turn GREEN during power-up phase • Turn off during power-down • All off = hangar closed

quickReference.title: Quick Reference Guide
quickReference.subtitle: Essential info for contested zone operations

hangarCycle.title: Executive Hangar Cycle
hangarCycle.greenPhase: Green Phase: ~65 min (OPEN - Insert boards now!)
hangarCycle.redPhase: Red Phase: ~120 min (Closed - Do NOT insert boards)

keycards.title: Keycard Types
keycards.cooldown: All printers have 30-minute cooldown after use

tips.title: Tips & Strategy
tips.markBoards: Mark compboards as you collect them
tips.startTimers: Start timers immediately when using printers
tips.allBoards: All 7 boards required for hangar access

footer.notAffiliated: Not affiliated with Cloud Imperium Games
footer.communityTool: Community tool for Star Citizen players
footer.disclaimer: This is an unofficial fan-made tool, not affiliated with or endorsed by Cloud Imperium Games.
footer.accuracy: Timer accuracy depends on your system clock. Use at your own risk.
